mcframework docs
=========================

A parallel, test-driven Monte Carlo framework for building and running
simulations efficiently.


Installation
^^^^^^^^^^^^
.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/milanfusco/mcframework.git
   cd mcframework
   pip install -e .
